channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【Effortless adjustments with an adaptive paste】轻松调整自适应糊剂
item.description: 【Find yourself needing to adjust pasted code to actually work in your project? Visual Studio 2022 introduces the capability to adapt your pasted code with Copilot to reduce the time you spend on making tedious changes. Streamline manual code modifications with adaptive paste When you’re copying and pasting code, the process often comes with extra […]】发现自己需要调整粘贴的代码以在项目中实际工作？ Visual Studio 2022介绍了与Copilot调整粘贴代码的能力，以减少您在进行乏味的更改上花费的时间。复制和粘贴代码时，用自适应糊剂简化手动代码修改，该过程通常带有额外的[…]

item.title: 【Announcing SharePoint Framework 1.21 with updates on building enterprise extensibility within Microsoft 365】宣布SharePoint Framework 1.21，其中有有关Microsoft 365中构建企业可扩展性的更新
item.description: 【We are excited to announce general availability for the SharePoint Framework 1.21. This time focus is primarily on technical platform updates and new UX options in SharePoint and in Viva Connections.】我们很高兴宣布SharePoint框架1.21的一般可用性。这次重点主要放在SharePoint和In Viva Connections中的技术平台更新和新的UX选项上。

item.title: 【Pure Virtual C++ 2025: Pre-Conference Videos】纯虚拟C ++ 2025：会议前视频
item.description: 【Pure Virtual C++ is our free, one-day, virtual conference for the whole C++ community. It is running on 30th April. The first half of our pre-conference videos is now available on YouTube. The videos are: MSVC C++23 Conformance Simplifying your Cross-Platform Development with Visual Studio C++ Dynamic Debugging How Debuggers Work A Year in Review: […]】纯虚拟C ++是我们为整个C ++社区提供的免费，为期一天的虚拟会议。它在4月30日运行。我们的会议前视频的上半年现在可以在YouTube上使用。视频是：MSVC C ++ 23一致性通过Visual Studio C ++动态调试简化了您的跨平台开发，调试者在评论中的工作方式：[…]

item.title: 【Spring Cleaning: A CTA for Azure DevOps OAuth Apps with expired or long-living secrets】春季清洁：Azure Devops Oauth应用程序的CTA具有过期或长寿的秘密
item.description: 【Today, we officially closed the doors on any new Azure DevOps OAuth app registrations. As we prepare for the end-of-life for Azure DevOps OAuth apps in 2026, we’ll begin outreach to engage existing app owners and support them through the migration process to use the Microsoft Identity platform instead for future app development with Azure […]】今天，我们在任何新的Azure Devops Oauth应用程序注册上正式关闭了门。当我们在2026年为Azure Devops Oauth应用程序的寿命终止做准备时，我们将开始宣传以吸引现有应用程序所有者并通过迁移过程支持它们，以使用Microsoft Identity平台，而不是使用Azure […]来进行未来的应用程序开发。

item.title: 【Azure Developer CLI (azd) in a real-life scenario】Azure开发人员CLI（AZD）在现实生活中
item.description: 【This post shares some useful tips and lessons learned while using azd during a migration.】这篇文章在迁移过程中使用AZD时分享了一些有用的技巧和经验教训。

item.title: 【Azure SDK modularized libraries for JavaScript】JavaScript的Azure SDK模块化库
item.description: 【This post announces new modularized libraries for the Azure SDK for JavaScript.】这篇文章宣布了JavaScript的Azure SDK的新模块化库。

item.title: 【Microsoft 365 Certification control spotlight: HIPAA】Microsoft 365认证控制聚光灯：HIPAA
item.description: 【Learn how Microsoft 365 Certification verifies that ISVs have established protocols for managing health information, dealing with emergencies and service disruptions, and complying with key HIPAA regulations.】了解Microsoft 365认证如何验证ISV已建立用于管理健康信息，处理紧急情况和服务中断以及遵守关键HIPAA法规的协议。

item.title: 【Customer Case Study: Microsoft Store Assistant — bringing multi expert intelligence to Microsoft Store chat with Semantic Kernel and Azure AI】客户案例研究：MicrosoftStoreassistant-将多专家智能带到Microsoftstore与Semantickernel和Azureai聊天
item.description: 【Introduction In October 2024 Microsoft replaced a legacy rule‑based chat bot on Microsoft Store with Microsoft Store Assistant, powered by Azure Open AI, Semantic Kernel, and real‑time page context. The transformation changed a scripted, button-driven experience into a conversation that comprehends the entire public Microsoft portfolio, including Surface and Xbox products, Microsoft 365 subscriptions, Azure services, and the Dynamics and Power Platform […]】介绍于2024年10月，Microsoft用Microsoft Store Assistant在Microsoft Store上取代了基于旧规则的聊天机器人，并由Azure Open AI，语义内核和实时页面上下文提供动力。转换将脚本式按钮驱动的体验更改为一个对话，该对话了解整个Microsoft Portfolio，包括Surface和Xbox产品，Microsoft 365订阅，Azure Services以及Dynamics and Power Platform […]

item.title: 【Important Updates to Container Images of Microsoft Build of OpenJDK】Microsoft构建的OpenJDK的容器图像的重要更新
item.description: 【Mariner Linux 2.0 will reach its End-Of-Life (EOL) in July of 2025 and will be replaced with Azure Linux (version 3.0). To ensure a smooth transition for our customers and partners, the Java Engineering Group (DevDiv JEG) behind the Microsoft Build of OpenJDK has developed a migration aligned with this timeline. This strategy takes effect […]】Mariner Linux 2.0将于2025年7月到达其寿命末（EOL），并将被Azure Linux（版本3.0）取代。为了确保我们的客户和合作伙伴的平稳过渡，Java工程组（Devdiv JEG）在Microsoft构建的OpenJDK背后已经开发了与此时间表保持一致的迁移。该策略生效[…]

item.title: 【When I define a window class with no default cursor, what is the explanation for the cursors that appear in my client area?】当我定义没有默认光标的窗口类时，对我的客户端区域中的光标有什么解释？
item.description: 【You said you'd take care of it, but you didn't.】你说你会照顾好它，但是你没有。
